item.title: Langroid Intro
item.description: Langroid: Harness LLMs with Multi-Agent Programming The LLM Opportunity Given the remarkable abilities of recent Large Language Models (LLMs), there is an unprecedented opportunity to build intelligent applications powered by this transformative technology. The top question for any enterprise is: how best to harness the power of LLMs for complex applications? For technical and practical reasons, building LLM-powered applications is not as simple as throwing a task at an LLM-system and expecting it to do it.
